weaver_geminate_attack.Note0: The second attack leaves Weaver 0.25 seconds after the first, and has no range limit.
weaver_geminate_attack.name: Geminate Attack
weaver_geminate_attack.Lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
weaver_geminate_attack.Description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

drow_ranger_frost_arrows.name: Frost Arrows
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.Note0: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.Lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.Description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts %frost_arrows_hero_duration_tooltip% seconds on Heroes, and %frost_arrows_creep_duration% seconds on creeps.\n\nFrost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

pudge_dismember.name: Dismember
pudge_dismember.Note0: Dismember will disable Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
pudge_dismember.Note1: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
pudge_dismember.Lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
pudge_dismember.Description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

legion_commander_moment_of_courage.name: Moment of Courage
legion_commander_moment_of_courage.Lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
legion_commander_moment_of_courage.Description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

ancient_apparition_cold_feet.name: Cold Feet
ancient_apparition_cold_feet.Lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
ancient_apparition_cold_feet.Description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

techies_remote_mines.name: Remote Mines
techies_remote_mines.Note0: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
techies_remote_mines.Description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

enchantress_natures_attendants.name: Nature's Attendants
enchantress_natures_attendants.Note0: Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.
enchantress_natures_attendants.Note1: Can heal units with spell immunity.
enchantress_natures_attendants.Lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
enchantress_natures_attendants.Description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.

shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.name: Mass Serpent Ward
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.aghanim_description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.Lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.Description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. It takes two hits to destroy a single Ward.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

drow_ranger_trueshot.name: Precision Aura
drow_ranger_trueshot.Lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
drow_ranger_trueshot.Description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

razor_unstable_current.name: Unstable Current
razor_unstable_current.Note0: Damage activates when the spell cast on Razor.
razor_unstable_current.Note1: Only activates if the caster is a hero unit.
razor_unstable_current.Lore: Attacking the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
razor_unstable_current.Description: Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

sven_warcry.name: Warcry
sven_warcry.Note0: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.
sven_warcry.Lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
sven_warcry.Description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.

wisp_overcharge.name: Overcharge
wisp_overcharge.Note0: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.
wisp_overcharge.Lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
wisp_overcharge.Description: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.

tiny_grow.name: Grow
tiny_grow.Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
tiny_grow.Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
tiny_grow.Lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
tiny_grow.Description: Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tiny_grow.aghanim_description: Allows Tiny to equip a tree, increasing his attack range, damage versus buildings, and granting a cleave attack.  Improves Tossed unit damage.

warlock_rain_of_chaos.name: Chaotic Offering
warlock_rain_of_chaos.Note0: Spell Immune units will be stunned.
warlock_rain_of_chaos.Note1: This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
warlock_rain_of_chaos.Lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
warlock_rain_of_chaos.Description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
warlock_rain_of_chaos.aghanim_description: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

earthshaker_aftershock.name: Aftershock
earthshaker_aftershock.Note0: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.
earthshaker_aftershock.Lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
earthshaker_aftershock.Description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.name: Atrophy Aura
abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.Lore: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.
abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.Description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If a unit dies while under this effect, Underlord gains bonus damage.

troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.name: Berserker's Rage
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.Note0: The bash stun goes through spell immunity.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.Lore: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.Note2: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Troll Warlord was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.Description: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants additional health, movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed.\n\nWhirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

enigma_black_hole.name: Black Hole
enigma_black_hole.aghanim_description: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.
enigma_black_hole.Lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
enigma_black_hole.Description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

centaur_khan_endurance_aura.name: Swiftness Aura
centaur_khan_endurance_aura.Description: The fearsome Hellbear Smasher attacks more quickly and bullies nearby allies into following suit.

crystal_maiden_frostbite.name: Frostbite
crystal_maiden_frostbite.Note0: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite.
crystal_maiden_frostbite.Lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
crystal_maiden_frostbite.Description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing %damage_per_second_tooltip% damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.Note2: Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.name: Concussive Shot
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.Note0: Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.Note1: Damages creeps around the impact area.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.Lore: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.Description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

magnataur_shockwave.name: Shockwave
magnataur_shockwave.Lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
magnataur_shockwave.Description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

disruptor_thunder_strike.name: Thunder Strike
disruptor_thunder_strike.Lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
disruptor_thunder_strike.Description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.

lion_impale.Note0: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.
lion_impale.name: Earth Spike
lion_impale.Lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
lion_impale.Description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

meepo_divided_we_stand.name: Divided We Stand
meepo_divided_we_stand.Note0: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.
meepo_divided_we_stand.Description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

mirana_arrow.name: Sacred Arrow
mirana_arrow.Note0: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
mirana_arrow.Note1: Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
mirana_arrow.Lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
mirana_arrow.Description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

nyx_assassin_burrow.name: Burrow
nyx_assassin_burrow.Lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
nyx_assassin_burrow.Description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

elder_titan_ancestral_spirit.name: Astral Spirit
elder_titan_ancestral_spirit.Lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.
elder_titan_ancestral_spirit.Description: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.\n\nThe Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abyssal_underlord_dark_rift.name: Dark Rift
abyssal_underlord_dark_rift.Lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
abyssal_underlord_dark_rift.Description: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.

wisp_spirits.name: Spirits
wisp_spirits.Lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.
wisp_spirits.out_Description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.
wisp_spirits.in_Description: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.
wisp_spirits.Description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

rubick_spell_steal.name: Spell Steal
rubick_spell_steal.aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown, increases cast range and upgrades the spell to the Scepter level.
rubick_spell_steal.Lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
rubick_spell_steal.Description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

bane_nightmare.name: Nightmare
bane_nightmare.Note0: Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself.
bane_nightmare.Lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
bane_nightmare.Note3: Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.
bane_nightmare.Note2: In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
bane_nightmare.Description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
bane_nightmare.Note1: Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred.

witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.Description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.Note0: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.Lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.name: Paralyzing Cask

batrider_firefly.Note2: The trail persists through Batrider's death.
batrider_firefly.name: Firefly
batrider_firefly.Note0: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.
batrider_firefly.Note1: If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.
batrider_firefly.Lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
batrider_firefly.Description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.

spectre_dispersion.Note2: Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.
spectre_dispersion.name: Dispersion
spectre_dispersion.Note0: The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre.
spectre_dispersion.Lore: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
spectre_dispersion.Description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

lich_frost_nova.name: Frost Blast
lich_frost_nova.Lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
lich_frost_nova.Description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.

dark_seer_vacuum.Note3: Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.
dark_seer_vacuum.name: Vacuum
dark_seer_vacuum.Note1: Pulls units over 0.5 seconds before dealing damage.
dark_seer_vacuum.Lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
dark_seer_vacuum.Description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.name: Sanity's Eclipse
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.aghanim_description: Sanity's Eclipse will also cast the current level of Astral Imprisonment on affected enemy heroes.
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.Lore: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.Description: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes %mana_drain%%% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

bristleback_bristleback.name: Bristleback
bristleback_bristleback.Note0: Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.
bristleback_bristleback.Note1: Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.
bristleback_bristleback.Lore: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
bristleback_bristleback.Description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes %quill_release_threshold% damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

alchemist_chemical_rage.name: Chemical Rage
alchemist_chemical_rage.Note0: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.
alchemist_chemical_rage.aghanim_description: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades.
alchemist_chemical_rage.Lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
alchemist_chemical_rage.Description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

brewmaster_drunken_haze.name: Drunken Haze
brewmaster_drunken_haze.Lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
brewmaster_drunken_haze.Description: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

life_stealer_infest.Note3: Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.
life_stealer_infest.Note2: Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.
life_stealer_infest.name: Infest
life_stealer_infest.Note0: If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.
life_stealer_infest.Note1: Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
life_stealer_infest.Lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
life_stealer_infest.Description: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health.  Does not work on enemy heroes.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

pudge_meat_hook.Note3: Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
pudge_meat_hook.Note2: Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units.
pudge_meat_hook.name: Meat Hook
pudge_meat_hook.Note0: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
pudge_meat_hook.Lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
pudge_meat_hook.Description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

venomancer_poison_sting.name: Poison Sting
venomancer_poison_sting.Note0: Poison Sting damage can be lethal.
venomancer_poison_sting.Note1: Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.
venomancer_poison_sting.Lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
venomancer_poison_sting.Description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

night_stalker_void.Lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
night_stalker_void.name: Void
night_stalker_void.Description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.name: Spirit Form
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.illuminate_Note0: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.illuminate_aghanim_description: Allows Illuminate to heal allies for 100%% of its damage values during daytime.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.illuminate_Description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.illuminate_Lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.Lore: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.aghanim_description: Permanent Spirit Form. During daytime, grants unobstructed vision, and allows Illuminate to heal allies for the same amount as its damage values.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.Description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

antimage_blink.Note0: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
antimage_blink.name: Blink
antimage_blink.Lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
antimage_blink.Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.name: Ice Vortex
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.Lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.Description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.

dark_troll_warlord_ensnare.name: Ensnare
dark_troll_warlord_ensnare.Description: The Dark Troll Summoner tosses netting around an enemy's feet, briefly immobilizing the unit, though the unit can still attack and use abilities. Interrupts channeling abilities.

gyrocopter_flak_cannon.name: Flak Cannon
gyrocopter_flak_cannon.Note0: Attack range for the primary attack is unchanged.
gyrocopter_flak_cannon.Lore: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.
gyrocopter_flak_cannon.Description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

item_monkey_king_bar_Description.name: Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.\nPassive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.

troll_warlord_fervor.name: Fervor
troll_warlord_fervor.Lore: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.
troll_warlord_fervor.Description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

morphling_adaptive_strike.name: Adaptive Strike
morphling_adaptive_strike.Lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
morphling_adaptive_strike.Description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50%% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50%% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.

dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.Note3: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Dragon Knight was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.Note2: Frost Breath stacks with Unique Attack Modifiers.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.name: Elder Dragon Form
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.Note0: Corrosive Breath poison damage is lethal.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.Note1: Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% damage in a 150/225/300 radius. Splash damage does not affect buildings.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.Lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

venomancer_poison_nova.name: Poison Nova
venomancer_poison_nova.Lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
venomancer_poison_nova.Description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

bloodseeker_thirst.Note2: Affects linger for 2 seconds if a target dies.
bloodseeker_thirst.name: Thirst
bloodseeker_thirst.Note1: Max movement speed and attack damage bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below 25%.
bloodseeker_thirst.Lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
bloodseeker_thirst.Description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

techies_stasis_trap.Note2: Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
techies_stasis_trap.name: Stasis Trap
techies_stasis_trap.Note0: Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
techies_stasis_trap.Note1: Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
techies_stasis_trap.Description: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.

weaver_shukuchi.name: Shukuchi
weaver_shukuchi.Note0: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.
weaver_shukuchi.Lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
weaver_shukuchi.Description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

tusk_walrus_kick.name: Walrus Kick
tusk_walrus_kick.Description: Kicks the target unit back, damaging them and slowing their movement speed.

phoenix_icarus_dive.name: Icarus Dive
phoenix_icarus_dive.Note0: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.
phoenix_icarus_dive.Lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
phoenix_icarus_dive.Description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

pudge_rot.Note3: Pudge can deny himself with this ability.
pudge_rot.Note2: If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
pudge_rot.name: Rot
pudge_rot.Lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
pudge_rot.Description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

omniknight_degen_aura.name: Degen Aura
omniknight_degen_aura.Note0: Does not affect Spell Immune units.
omniknight_degen_aura.Lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
omniknight_degen_aura.Description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

huskar_life_break.name: Life Break
huskar_life_break.Note0: If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.
huskar_life_break.Note1: Slow works on Spell Immune units.
huskar_life_break.Lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
huskar_life_break.Description: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

witch_doctor_death_ward.Note2: Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
witch_doctor_death_ward.name: Death Ward
witch_doctor_death_ward.Note0: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
witch_doctor_death_ward.aghanim_description: Death Ward attacks bounce between nearby enemies.
witch_doctor_death_ward.Note1: The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
witch_doctor_death_ward.Lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
witch_doctor_death_ward.Description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

queenofpain_sonic_wave.name: Sonic Wave
queenofpain_sonic_wave.Note0: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.
queenofpain_sonic_wave.Lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
queenofpain_sonic_wave.Description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

invoker_chaos_meteor.name: Chaos Meteor
invoker_chaos_meteor.Note0: Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every 0.5 seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over 3 seconds.
invoker_chaos_meteor.Description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
invoker_chaos_meteor.Note1: The meteor moves at a speed of 300.

broodmother_poison_sting.name: Poison Sting
broodmother_poison_sting.Description: Poisons and slows enemies with each attack.

tusk_snowball.name: Snowball
tusk_snowball.Note4: Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.
tusk_snowball.Note1: The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.
tusk_snowball.Lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
tusk_snowball.Note3: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
tusk_snowball.Note2: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
tusk_snowball.Description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a %snowball_grab_radius% radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.name: Glaives of Wisdom
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.Lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.Description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.

drow_ranger_silence.name: Silence
drow_ranger_silence.Lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
drow_ranger_silence.Description: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

shredder_chakram.name: Chakram
shredder_chakram.2_Description: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5%% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
shredder_chakram.Note0: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.
shredder_chakram.Description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5%% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
shredder_chakram.2_Note0: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.
shredder_chakram.2_Lore: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!

ogre_magi_fireblast.name: Fireblast
ogre_magi_fireblast.Note0: When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.3 seconds interval.
ogre_magi_fireblast.Note1: Mana cost is increased by 20 / 40 / 60 when learning Multi Cast.
ogre_magi_fireblast.Lore: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
ogre_magi_fireblast.Description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

morphling_morph_agi.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
morphling_morph_agi.Note0: Morph can be activated or deactivated while Morphling is disabled, but not while silenced.
morphling_morph_agi.Note1: Morph can't convert stats from items.
morphling_morph_agi.Lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
morphling_morph_agi.Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.

queenofpain_blink.Note0: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
queenofpain_blink.name: Blink
queenofpain_blink.Lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
queenofpain_blink.Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

phoenix_supernova.name: Supernova
phoenix_supernova.aghanim_description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together. Does not refresh ultimate abilities.
phoenix_supernova.Lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
phoenix_supernova.Description:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After %tooltip_duration% seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

lina_light_strike_array.name: Light Strike Array
lina_light_strike_array.Note0: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.
lina_light_strike_array.Lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
lina_light_strike_array.Description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

leshrac_lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
leshrac_lightning_storm.Lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.
leshrac_lightning_storm.Description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.

centaur_hoof_stomp.name: Hoof Stomp
centaur_hoof_stomp.Lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
centaur_hoof_stomp.Description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

polar_furbolg_ursa_warrior_thunder_clap.Description: The Hellbear Smasher claps his massive hands together, creating a deafening blast. The blast damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing.
polar_furbolg_ursa_warrior_thunder_clap.name: Thunder Clap

faceless_void_time_walk.name: Time Walk
faceless_void_time_walk.Note0: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.
faceless_void_time_walk.Lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
faceless_void_time_walk.Description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last %backtrack_duration% seconds.

lion_finger_of_death.name: Finger of Death
lion_finger_of_death.Note0: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
lion_finger_of_death.aghanim_description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
lion_finger_of_death.Lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
lion_finger_of_death.Description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

life_stealer_feast.Note3: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
life_stealer_feast.Note2: The heal is independent of the damage.
life_stealer_feast.name: Feast
life_stealer_feast.Lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
life_stealer_feast.Description: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

undying_tombstone.name: Tombstone
undying_tombstone.Note0: Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.
undying_tombstone.Lore: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
undying_tombstone.zombie_deathstrike_Description: Slows enemy units on attack.  If the attacked unit's health goes below the threshold, the zombie receives enhanced movement and attack speed.
undying_tombstone.Description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
undying_tombstone.Note2: If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.
undying_tombstone.Note1: Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.

zuus_static_field.Note2: Does not require unit visibility to take effect.
zuus_static_field.name: Static Field
zuus_static_field.Note0: The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell.
zuus_static_field.Note1: Using items doesn't trigger Static Field.
zuus_static_field.Lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
zuus_static_field.Description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.name: Unrefined Fireblast
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.Lore: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.Description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 60%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.name: Rocket Barrage
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.Note0: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.Lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.Description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.name: Wave of Terror
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.Lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.Description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

ogre_magi_multicast.name: Multicast
ogre_magi_multicast.Lore: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.

brewmaster_storm_dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
brewmaster_storm_dispel_magic.Description: Damages summoned units in an area and purges most buffs or debuffs.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

skywrath_mage_ancient_seal.Description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal.Note0: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal.Lore: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal.name: Ancient Seal

item_medallion_of_courage_Description.name: Active: Valor - If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies.

terrorblade_metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
terrorblade_metamorphosis.Note0: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Terrorblade was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
terrorblade_metamorphosis.Lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
terrorblade_metamorphosis.Description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within %metamorph_aura_tooltip% range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.

disruptor_kinetic_field.name: Kinetic Field
disruptor_kinetic_field.Note0: Spell Immune units can travel through the field.
disruptor_kinetic_field.Lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
disruptor_kinetic_field.Description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

vengefulspirit_magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
vengefulspirit_magic_missile.Lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
vengefulspirit_magic_missile.Description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

huskar_burning_spear.name: Burning Spear
huskar_burning_spear.Note0: Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap.
huskar_burning_spear.Note1: Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.
huskar_burning_spear.Lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
huskar_burning_spear.Description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.

dazzle_poison_touch.Note0: The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
dazzle_poison_touch.name: Poison Touch
dazzle_poison_touch.Lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.

invoker_deafening_blast.name: Deafening Blast
invoker_deafening_blast.Description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

naga_siren_ensnare.name: Ensnare
naga_siren_ensnare.Lore: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.
naga_siren_ensnare.Description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

bristleback_quill_spray.Description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
bristleback_quill_spray.Note0: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
bristleback_quill_spray.Lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
bristleback_quill_spray.name: Quill Spray

storm_spirit_electric_vortex.name: Electric Vortex
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.aghanim_description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.Lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.Description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50%% for 3 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

mirana_invis.name: Moonlight Shadow
mirana_invis.Note0: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
mirana_invis.Note1: Spell Immune allies will be affected.
mirana_invis.Lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
mirana_invis.Description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.name: Coup de Grace
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.Lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.Description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

shredder_whirling_death.name: Whirling Death
shredder_whirling_death.Lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
shredder_whirling_death.Description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

gyrocopter_homing_missile.Note3: The missile will follow and hit invisible units.
gyrocopter_homing_missile.Note2: Maximum damage is reached when the missile is 1500 units away.
gyrocopter_homing_missile.name: Homing Missile
gyrocopter_homing_missile.Note0: Towers do half damage to the missile.
gyrocopter_homing_missile.Note1: The crosshair effect is visible to allies only.
gyrocopter_homing_missile.Lore: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
gyrocopter_homing_missile.Description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

treant_natures_guise.name: Nature's Guise
treant_natures_guise.Note0: Attack out of invisibilty cannot miss.
treant_natures_guise.Note1: Nature's Guise checks in 0.75 second intervals for nearby trees, removing invisibility if none are found.
treant_natures_guise.Lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.
treant_natures_guise.Description: Turns you invis when you are within %radius% radius of a tree for %fade_time% seconds. Increasing movement speed by %bonus_move_speed% while invisible, and causes a %bash_duration% seconds bash when attacking out of invisibility.

visage_gravekeepers_cloak.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
visage_gravekeepers_cloak.Note0: Each time Visage receives damage greater than 50 that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.
visage_gravekeepers_cloak.Lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
visage_gravekeepers_cloak.Description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

rubick_null_field.name: Null Field
rubick_null_field.Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
rubick_null_field.Lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
rubick_null_field.Description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.

terrorblade_conjure_image.Lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
terrorblade_conjure_image.name: Conjure Image
terrorblade_conjure_image.Description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

riki_tricks_of_the_trade.name: Tricks of the Trade
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.Note0: Attacks once when casted and once per second after that.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.aghanim_description: Increases duration and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.Note1: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.Lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.Description: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a %range% AoE once per second.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

morphling_morph_str.name: Morph (Strength Gain)
morphling_morph_str.Note0: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced.
morphling_morph_str.Note1: Morph can't convert stats from items.
morphling_morph_str.Lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
morphling_morph_str.Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.

tinker_march_of_the_machines.name: March of the Machines
tinker_march_of_the_machines.Note0: Robots spawn at a rate of 24 per second.
tinker_march_of_the_machines.Lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
tinker_march_of_the_machines.Description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

elder_titan_earth_splitter.name: Earth Splitter
elder_titan_earth_splitter.aghanim_description: Increases slow duration, and units pulled in by Earth Splitter are also disarmed.
elder_titan_earth_splitter.Lore: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.
elder_titan_earth_splitter.Description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

luna_moon_glaive.name: Moon Glaive
luna_moon_glaive.Lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
luna_moon_glaive.Description: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

invoker_ghost_walk.name: Ghost Walk
invoker_ghost_walk.Note0: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.
invoker_ghost_walk.Description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

mirana_starfall.Note2: Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
mirana_starfall.name: Starstorm
mirana_starfall.Note0: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
mirana_starfall.aghanim_description: Passively triggers Starstorm every 10 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.
mirana_starfall.Lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
mirana_starfall.Description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %dstarfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for 75%% of the damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

phoenix_launch_fire_spirit.name: Launch Fire Spirit
phoenix_launch_fire_spirit.Description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced. Reveals the area it strikes for 1 second.

dark_seer_surge.Note0: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.
dark_seer_surge.name: Surge
dark_seer_surge.Lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
dark_seer_surge.Description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

lycan_summon_wolves.name: Summon Wolves
lycan_summon_wolves.Note0: If wolves are summoned during the duration of Howl, they will receive the buff until the end of its duration.
lycan_summon_wolves.Lore: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
lycan_summon_wolves.Note2: Using this spell will replace currently active Spirit Wolves.
lycan_summon_wolves.Description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.
lycan_summon_wolves.Note1: Spirit Wolves have 80% magic damage resistance.
lycan_summon_wolves.critical_strike_Description: Gives %maim_chance%%% to cripple the target, causing %maim_damage% damage per second and lose %maim_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %maim_duration% seconds.

chen_holy_persuasion.Note2: The health of creeps that are currently persuaded will not be increased further if more levels are added to the skill.
chen_holy_persuasion.name: Holy Persuasion
chen_holy_persuasion.Note0: You may only cast this ability on Ancient Creeps with Aghanim's Scepter.
chen_holy_persuasion.aghanim_description: Holy Persuasion can target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.
chen_holy_persuasion.Note1: When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.
chen_holy_persuasion.Lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
chen_holy_persuasion.Description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.

jakiro_liquid_fire.name: Liquid Fire
jakiro_liquid_fire.Note0: Works on both units and buildings.
jakiro_liquid_fire.Lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
jakiro_liquid_fire.Description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

slardar_slithereen_crush.name: Slithereen Crush
slardar_slithereen_crush.Lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
slardar_slithereen_crush.Description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

silencer_curse_of_the_silent.name: Arcane Curse
silencer_curse_of_the_silent.Note0: If an enemy hero affected by Arcane Curse is silenced, Arcane Curse will pause damage, slow and duration.
silencer_curse_of_the_silent.Lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
silencer_curse_of_the_silent.Description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

pugna_life_drain.name: Life Drain
pugna_life_drain.Note0: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt.
pugna_life_drain.aghanim_description: Increases drain per second and removes cooldown.
pugna_life_drain.Note1: Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
pugna_life_drain.Lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
pugna_life_drain.Description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.name: Blinding Light
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.Note0: Causes knockback of 250 range over 0.4 seconds, centered on the middle of the target area. Upon landing, units will destroy trees in a 150 radius.
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.Lore: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.Description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.

meepo_earthbind.name: Earthbind
meepo_earthbind.Note0: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible.
meepo_earthbind.Note1: Does not work on Spell Immune units or Roshan.
meepo_earthbind.Lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
meepo_earthbind.Description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility and blink.

abaddon_borrowed_time.name: Borrowed Time
abaddon_borrowed_time.Note0: Borrowed Time can be activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.
abaddon_borrowed_time.aghanim_description: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, a percentage of all damage taken by allied Heroes in a radius will be redirected to Abaddon.
abaddon_borrowed_time.Lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
abaddon_borrowed_time.Description:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below %hp_threshold%.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

elder_titan_echo_stomp.name: Echo Stomp
elder_titan_echo_stomp.Lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
elder_titan_echo_stomp.spirit_Description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.
elder_titan_echo_stomp.spirit_Lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
elder_titan_echo_stomp.Description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

oracle_fates_edict.name: Fate's Edict
oracle_fates_edict.Lore: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...
oracle_fates_edict.Description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them %magic_damage_resistance_pct_tooltip%%% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.

dark_seer_wall_of_replica.name: Wall of Replica
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.Note0: Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.Lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.aghanim_description: Increases the damage dealt by illusions.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.Note1: Creates a wall 1000 units long, perpendicular to the line between Dark Seer and the target point.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.Description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.name: Phantom Rush
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.Note0: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.Lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.Description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost upon reaching the target. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

ancient_apparition_ice_blast.name: Ice Blast
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Note4: The Frostbitten debuff cannot be purged.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Note0: The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000.  The freeze area along the path is 275.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Note1: Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.release_Description: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Note3: The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Note2: The instant kill doesn't work on illusions.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.Description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

life_stealer_assimilate.Description: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
life_stealer_assimilate.eject_Description: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.
life_stealer_assimilate.Lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?
life_stealer_assimilate.name: Assimilate

ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.name: Chilling Touch
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.Note0: Extra damage is its own instance of damage.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.Note1: Only works against heroes and creeps.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.Lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.Description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.

antimage_spell_shield.name: Spell Shield
antimage_spell_shield.Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
antimage_spell_shield.aghanim_description: Causes Spell Shield to passively block and reflect a targeted spell once every 12 seconds.
antimage_spell_shield.Lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
antimage_spell_shield.Description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

arc_warden_tempest_double.name: Tempest Double
arc_warden_tempest_double.Lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
arc_warden_tempest_double.Description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has seperate item and ability cooldowns.

nyx_assassin_impale.name: Impale
nyx_assassin_impale.Note0: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.
nyx_assassin_impale.Note1: Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.
nyx_assassin_impale.Lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
nyx_assassin_impale.Description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

ember_spirit_fire_remnant.name: Fire Remnant
ember_spirit_fire_remnant.Note1: Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.
ember_spirit_fire_remnant.Lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
ember_spirit_fire_remnant.Description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every %dcharge_restore_time% seconds, with a max of %max_charges% charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.

slark_shadow_dance.name: Shadow Dance
slark_shadow_dance.Note0: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the passive movement and health regeneration bonuses are lost for 2 seconds.
slark_shadow_dance.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown and causes Shadow Dance active to be an area of effect ability, hiding nearby allied heroes underneath it.
slark_shadow_dance.Note1: The passive movement and health regeneration bonuses have a 0.5 second activation and deactivation delay.
slark_shadow_dance.Lore: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
slark_shadow_dance.Description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

invoker_cold_snap.name: Cold Snap
invoker_cold_snap.Note0: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than 10 after reductions.
invoker_cold_snap.Description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.

doom_bringer_devour.Note3: If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.
doom_bringer_devour.Note2: Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units.
doom_bringer_devour.name: Devour
doom_bringer_devour.Note0: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.
doom_bringer_devour.Note1: The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit.
doom_bringer_devour.Lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
doom_bringer_devour.Description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.

lina_laguna_blade.name: Laguna Blade
lina_laguna_blade.Note0: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
lina_laguna_blade.aghanim_description: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
lina_laguna_blade.Lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
lina_laguna_blade.Description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

troll_warlord_battle_trance.name: Battle Trance
troll_warlord_battle_trance.Lore: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.
troll_warlord_battle_trance.Description: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.

beastmaster_boar_poison.name: Poison
beastmaster_boar_poison.Description: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.

windrunner_windrun.name: Windrun
windrunner_windrun.Note0: The slow will affect enemies with spell immunity.
windrunner_windrun.Note1: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
windrunner_windrun.Lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
windrunner_windrun.Description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

tinker_laser.Description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tinker_laser.name: Laser
tinker_laser.aghanim_description: Causes Laser to refract between all visible enemy units within range.
tinker_laser.Lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

broodmother_incapacitating_bite.name: Incapacitating Bite
broodmother_incapacitating_bite.Note0: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite.Lore: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite.Description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.name: Phantom Strike
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.Lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.Description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

life_stealer_open_wounds.name: Open Wounds
life_stealer_open_wounds.Note0: Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70% / 70% / 60% / 50% / 30% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.
life_stealer_open_wounds.Note1: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
life_stealer_open_wounds.Lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
life_stealer_open_wounds.Description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.name: Hunter in the Night
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.Lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.Description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

gyrocopter_call_down.name: Call Down
gyrocopter_call_down.Note0: The visual indicator is visible to allies only.
gyrocopter_call_down.aghanim_description: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units within a 600 radius every 1.1 seconds.
gyrocopter_call_down.Description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for %slow_duration_first% seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for %slow_duration_second% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.name: Chakra Magic
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.Lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.Description: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

axe_battle_hunger.name: Battle Hunger
axe_battle_hunger.Note0: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
axe_battle_hunger.Note1: Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.
axe_battle_hunger.Lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
axe_battle_hunger.Description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.

slark_essence_shift.name: Essence Shift
slark_essence_shift.Note1: Essence Shifted stats are returned to normal on death. The stat return for Slark and for the affected hero are separate.
slark_essence_shift.Lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
slark_essence_shift.Description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

invoker_quas.Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
invoker_quas.name: Quas
invoker_quas.Description: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.\n

kunkka_ghostship.Lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
kunkka_ghostship.Note0: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
kunkka_ghostship.Note2: The boat has a movement speed of 650.
kunkka_ghostship.Description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.\n\nUpgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
kunkka_ghostship.aghanim_description: Drags enemies with the Ghostship towards the crash site. Enemies are still able to perform actions while being dragged.
kunkka_ghostship.Note1: Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
kunkka_ghostship.name: Ghostship

spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.Note2: Spirit Breaker gains shared vision of the target.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.name: Charge of Darkness
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.Note0: Spirit Breaker passes through trees, cliffs, and units.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.Note1: The charge indicator is visible only to allies.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.Lore: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.Description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

pugna_nether_ward.Note2: Nether Ward has 4 HP. Heroes attack it for 1 damage, while illusions and non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
pugna_nether_ward.name: Nether Ward
pugna_nether_ward.Note0: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.
