pugna_nether_ward.Lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
pugna_nether_ward.Description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.

shadow_shaman_voodoo.name: Hex
shadow_shaman_voodoo.Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
shadow_shaman_voodoo.Lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
shadow_shaman_voodoo.Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abaddon_death_coil.name: Mist Coil
abaddon_death_coil.Lore: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.
abaddon_death_coil.Description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

enchantress_untouchable.name: Untouchable
enchantress_untouchable.Note0: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed.
enchantress_untouchable.Note1: The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.
enchantress_untouchable.Lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
enchantress_untouchable.Description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

windrunner_focusfire.name: Focus Fire
windrunner_focusfire.Note0: Can target buildings and Spell Immune units.
windrunner_focusfire.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown, decreases damage reduction, and removes penalty from Unique Attack Modifiers and item effects.
windrunner_focusfire.Lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
windrunner_focusfire.Description: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.  Lasts %focusfire_duration_tooltip% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.name: Spiked Carapace
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.Note0: The damage is calculated after all reductions.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.Note1: Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.Lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.Description: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.\n\nWhile Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

juggernaut_healing_ward.name: Healing Ward
juggernaut_healing_ward.Note0: The healing ward can be controlled.
juggernaut_healing_ward.Lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
juggernaut_healing_ward.Description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %healing_ward_duration_tooltip% seconds.

lina_fiery_soul.name: Fiery Soul
lina_fiery_soul.Note0: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.
lina_fiery_soul.Note1: Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
lina_fiery_soul.Lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
lina_fiery_soul.Description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts %fiery_soul_stack_duration% seconds.

disruptor_glimpse.Note0: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.
disruptor_glimpse.name: Glimpse
disruptor_glimpse.Lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.
disruptor_glimpse.Description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.

clinkz_strafe.name: Strafe
clinkz_strafe.Lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
clinkz_strafe.Description: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

enigma_midnight_pulse.name: Midnight Pulse
enigma_midnight_pulse.Note1: This ability destroys trees in its area.
enigma_midnight_pulse.Lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
enigma_midnight_pulse.Description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

lycan_howl.name: Howl
lycan_howl.Lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.
lycan_howl.Description: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.

arc_warden_flux.Description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
arc_warden_flux.name: Flux
arc_warden_flux.Lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

kunkka_torrent.name: Torrent
kunkka_torrent.Note0: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies.
kunkka_torrent.Note1: Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.
kunkka_torrent.Lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
kunkka_torrent.Description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

terrorblade_reflection.name: Reflection
terrorblade_reflection.Note1: Reflections can only attack their source.
terrorblade_reflection.Lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
terrorblade_reflection.Description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.

life_stealer_consume.name: Consume
life_stealer_consume.Description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

sven_great_cleave.Note2: The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.
sven_great_cleave.name: Great Cleave
sven_great_cleave.Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
sven_great_cleave.Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
sven_great_cleave.Lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
sven_great_cleave.Description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

ember_spirit_searing_chains.name: Searing Chains
ember_spirit_searing_chains.Note0: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
ember_spirit_searing_chains.Note1: Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.
ember_spirit_searing_chains.Lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
ember_spirit_searing_chains.Description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

brewmaster_primal_split.Note2: When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.
brewmaster_primal_split.name: Primal Split
brewmaster_primal_split.Note0: The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.
brewmaster_primal_split.aghanim_description: Earth gains Thunder Clap, Storm gains Drunken Haze and Fire gains Drunken Brawler.
brewmaster_primal_split.Note1: The Fire Element has phased movement.
brewmaster_primal_split.Lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
brewmaster_primal_split.Description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

skeleton_king_reincarnation.name: Reincarnation
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Note4: Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Note0: Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Note1: If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Note3: Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Note2: Revives with full HP and Mana.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.Description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a %slow_radius% radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.aghanim_description: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds.

broodmother_insatiable_hunger.name: Insatiable Hunger
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.Note0: Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.Lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.Description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

medusa_stone_gaze.name: Stone Gaze
medusa_stone_gaze.Note1: Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.
medusa_stone_gaze.Lore: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
medusa_stone_gaze.Description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100%% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

enchantress_enchant.Description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.
enchantress_enchant.name: Enchant
enchantress_enchant.Lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.

templar_assassin_self_trap.name: Trap
templar_assassin_self_trap.Description: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.

obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.Description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals %int_steal% intelligence for %int_steal_duration% seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.\n\nArcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.Note0: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.Lore: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.name: Arcane Orb

enigma_demonic_conversion.name: Demonic Conversion
enigma_demonic_conversion.Note0: Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
enigma_demonic_conversion.Lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
enigma_demonic_conversion.Description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak.Description: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak.name: Mana Leak
keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak.Note0: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.
keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak.Lore: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.

phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.name: Spirit Lance
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.Note0: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.Lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.Description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.aghanim_description: Causes Spirit Lance to bounce on nearby enemies.

enigma_malefice.name: Malefice
enigma_malefice.Lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
enigma_malefice.Description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

centaur_return.name: Return
centaur_return.Note0: Return triggers when the attack hits.
centaur_return.Lore: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
centaur_return.Description: Centaur applies an aura to nearby allied units. Causes allies to counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

lone_druid_rabid.Description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
lone_druid_rabid.Lore: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.
lone_druid_rabid.name: Rabid

brewmaster_thunder_clap.Lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
brewmaster_thunder_clap.name: Thunder Clap
brewmaster_thunder_clap.Description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

pudge_flesh_heap.Description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
pudge_flesh_heap.Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
pudge_flesh_heap.Lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
pudge_flesh_heap.name: Flesh Heap

pugna_decrepify.name: Decrepify
pugna_decrepify.Note0: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.
pugna_decrepify.Lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
pugna_decrepify.Description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.

queenofpain_shadow_strike.name: Shadow Strike
queenofpain_shadow_strike.Note0: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
queenofpain_shadow_strike.Note1: Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
queenofpain_shadow_strike.Lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
queenofpain_shadow_strike.Description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

silencer_last_word.name: Last Word
silencer_last_word.Note0: Channeling abilities will trigger this effect once the caster finishes its channel.
silencer_last_word.Lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
silencer_last_word.Description: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.

tidehunter_gush.name: Gush
tidehunter_gush.aghanim_description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.
tidehunter_gush.Lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
tidehunter_gush.Description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

templar_assassin_meld.name: Meld
templar_assassin_meld.Note0: Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position.
templar_assassin_meld.Note1: Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.
templar_assassin_meld.Lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
templar_assassin_meld.Description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %armor_reduction_duration_tooltip% seconds.

faceless_void_chronosphere.name: Chronosphere
faceless_void_chronosphere.Note0: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.
faceless_void_chronosphere.Note1: Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
faceless_void_chronosphere.Lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
faceless_void_chronosphere.Description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

bane_enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
bane_enfeeble.Lore: Even the mightiest of warriors crumble before the terror of Atropos.
bane_enfeeble.Description: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.

techies_focused_detonate.name: Focused Detonate
techies_focused_detonate.Lore: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?
techies_focused_detonate.Description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.

lycan_feral_impulse.name: Feral Impulse
lycan_feral_impulse.Lore: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.
lycan_feral_impulse.Description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.name: Wraithfire Blast
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.Lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.Description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

luna_lucent_beam.name: Lucent Beam
luna_lucent_beam.Lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
luna_lucent_beam.Description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

treant_living_armor.name: Living Armor
treant_living_armor.Note0: Can be cast through the minimap.
treant_living_armor.Lore: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.
treant_living_armor.Description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

viper_nethertoxin.name: Nethertoxin
viper_nethertoxin.Lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
viper_nethertoxin.Description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20%% of health missing from the target.  Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.

disruptor_static_storm.name: Static Storm
disruptor_static_storm.Lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.
disruptor_static_storm.Description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

faceless_void_time_dilation.name: Time Dilation
faceless_void_time_dilation.Description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for %duration% seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by %slow%%% for each cooldown frozen.

bounty_hunter_jinada.Description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
bounty_hunter_jinada.Lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
bounty_hunter_jinada.name: Jinada

huskar_berserkers_blood.name: Berserker's Blood
huskar_berserkers_blood.Note0: Maximum bonus is achieved when Huskar has strictly less than 10% of his maximum HP.
huskar_berserkers_blood.Note1: Bonuses are provided linearly, no bonus at 100% HP and full bonus at 10% HP.
huskar_berserkers_blood.Lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
huskar_berserkers_blood.Description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

spectre_haunt.name: Haunt
spectre_haunt.Note0: Haunt illusions are uncontrollable and move at 400 base movement speed.
spectre_haunt.Note1: There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.
spectre_haunt.Lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
spectre_haunt.Description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.\n\nHaunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

riki_smoke_screen.name: Smoke Screen
riki_smoke_screen.Note0: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
riki_smoke_screen.Lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
riki_smoke_screen.Description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

templar_assassin_refraction.name: Refraction
templar_assassin_refraction.Note0: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).
templar_assassin_refraction.Note1: Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.
templar_assassin_refraction.Lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
templar_assassin_refraction.Description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

omniknight_purification.name: Purification
omniknight_purification.Lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.
omniknight_purification.Description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

naga_siren_rip_tide.name: Rip Tide
naga_siren_rip_tide.Note0: Naga's illusions will also cast Rip Tide, but enemies in multiple areas of effect will only be hit once.
naga_siren_rip_tide.Lore: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.
naga_siren_rip_tide.Description: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

warlock_shadow_word.name: Shadow Word
warlock_shadow_word.Lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
warlock_shadow_word.Description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

dark_troll_warlord_raise_dead.name: Raise Dead
dark_troll_warlord_raise_dead.Description: The Dark Troll Summoner stirs the ground underfoot, raising the remains of trolls long dead, bringing to life two skeleton Warriors who will fight at his side.

puck_illusory_orb.name: Illusory Orb
puck_illusory_orb.Note0: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
puck_illusory_orb.Note1: Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.
puck_illusory_orb.Lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
puck_illusory_orb.Description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

undying_flesh_golem.name: Flesh Golem
undying_flesh_golem.Note0: Undying is healed when affected units die in range, regardless of who killed it.
undying_flesh_golem.Lore: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
undying_flesh_golem.Note3: The minimum damage amplification and move slow from Plague Aura is 1%.
undying_flesh_golem.Note2: Plague Aura goes through spell immunity.
undying_flesh_golem.Description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within %radius% range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.
undying_flesh_golem.Note1: Dying illusions don't trigger the heal.

broodmother_spawn_spiderite.name: Spawn Spiderite
broodmother_spawn_spiderite.Description: Applies debuff on attack. If debuffed unit dies, a spiderite will spawn.

huskar_inner_vitality.name: Inner Vitality
huskar_inner_vitality.Note0: The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.
huskar_inner_vitality.Note1: Can be cast on Spell Immune units.
huskar_inner_vitality.Lore: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
huskar_inner_vitality.Description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.

death_prophet_exorcism.name: Exorcism
death_prophet_exorcism.Note0: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
death_prophet_exorcism.Note1: Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
death_prophet_exorcism.Lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
death_prophet_exorcism.Description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

phantom_lancer_juxtapose.name: Juxtapose
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.Note0: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.Lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.Description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for %illusion_duration% seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last %illusion_from_illusion_duration% seconds.

beastmaster_wild_axes.name: Wild Axes
beastmaster_wild_axes.Note0: This ability hits Spell Immune units.
beastmaster_wild_axes.Lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
beastmaster_wild_axes.Description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.

ogre_magi_frost_armor.name: Ice Armor
ogre_magi_frost_armor.Description: The Ogre Frostmage summons an invisible layer of icy air that surrounds the target friendly unit, increasing its armor and temporarily slowing any melee enemies that dare attack it.

storm_spirit_static_remnant.Note2: The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.
storm_spirit_static_remnant.name: Static Remnant
storm_spirit_static_remnant.Note0: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast.
storm_spirit_static_remnant.Note1: Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
storm_spirit_static_remnant.Lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
storm_spirit_static_remnant.Description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

magnataur_empower.name: Empower
magnataur_empower.Note0: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes.
magnataur_empower.Note1: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
magnataur_empower.Lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
magnataur_empower.Note2: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
magnataur_empower.Description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
magnataur_empower.aghanim_description: Changes Empower to be an allied hero aura. Affects ranged heroes for half values and causes them to splash around the target. Can still be cast on units, but doesn't stack.

kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.name: X Marks the Spot
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.Note0: If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.Lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.Description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.name: Astral Imprisonment
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.Note0: Imprisoned units are hidden and invulnerable.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.Note1: Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.Lore: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.Description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals %damage% damage to enemies in a %radius% radius around the target.

warlock_golem_permanent_immolation.name: Permanent Immolation
warlock_golem_permanent_immolation.Description: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, with damage per second.

nevermore_shadowraze2.name: Shadowraze
nevermore_shadowraze2.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

lina_dragon_slave.Note0: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
lina_dragon_slave.name: Dragon Slave
lina_dragon_slave.Lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
lina_dragon_slave.Description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

leshrac_pulse_nova.name: Pulse Nova
leshrac_pulse_nova.Lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
leshrac_pulse_nova.Description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

puck_ethereal_jaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
puck_ethereal_jaunt.Description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

zuus_thundergods_wrath.name: Thundergod's Wrath
zuus_thundergods_wrath.aghanim_description: Grants a new ability, creating a cloud that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
zuus_thundergods_wrath.Lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
zuus_thundergods_wrath.Description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

shadow_demon_soul_catcher.name: Soul Catcher
shadow_demon_soul_catcher.Lore: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.
shadow_demon_soul_catcher.Description: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.

invoker_emp.y2_Description: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
invoker_emp.name: E.M.P.
invoker_emp.Note0: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).
invoker_emp.y1_Description: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
invoker_emp.Description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50%% of the mana drained.

enchantress_impetus.name: Impetus
enchantress_impetus.Note0: The damage is capped at 1750 distance.
enchantress_impetus.aghanim_description: Increases attack range, and cast range of Impetus.
enchantress_impetus.Note1: Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.
enchantress_impetus.Lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
enchantress_impetus.Description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

kunkka_tidebringer.name: Tidebringer
kunkka_tidebringer.Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
kunkka_tidebringer.Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
kunkka_tidebringer.Lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
kunkka_tidebringer.Description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

spirit_breaker_empowering_haste.name: Empowering Haste
spirit_breaker_empowering_haste.Lore: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.
spirit_breaker_empowering_haste.Description: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for %duration% seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

monkey_king_tree_dance.name: Tree Dance
monkey_king_tree_dance.Note0: Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
monkey_king_tree_dance.Note1: Right-click ground to drop from tree.
monkey_king_tree_dance.Lore: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
monkey_king_tree_dance.Description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.

razor_static_link.name: Static Link
razor_static_link.Note0: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes greater than 800 (1020 with Aether Lens).
razor_static_link.Lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
razor_static_link.Description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee.Description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

visage_grave_chill.name: Grave Chill
visage_grave_chill.Note0: The two buffs can be removed separately by purge.
visage_grave_chill.Note1: The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.
visage_grave_chill.Lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
visage_grave_chill.Description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

sniper_take_aim.name: Take Aim
sniper_take_aim.Lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.
sniper_take_aim.Description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

undying_decay.name: Decay
undying_decay.Note0: The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.
undying_decay.Note1: The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.
undying_decay.Lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.
undying_decay.Description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

sven_gods_strength.name: God's Strength
sven_gods_strength.Note0: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
sven_gods_strength.aghanim_description: God's Strength grants bonus damage to allies in a 900 radius.
sven_gods_strength.Lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
sven_gods_strength.Description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

sniper_headshot.name: Headshot
sniper_headshot.Lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
sniper_headshot.Description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.

medusa_split_shot.name: Split Shot
medusa_split_shot.Note0: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.
medusa_split_shot.Note1: If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.
medusa_split_shot.Lore: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
medusa_split_shot.Description: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.\n\nThe extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.

earthshaker_enchant_totem.name: Enchant Totem
earthshaker_enchant_totem.Note0: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
earthshaker_enchant_totem.aghanim_description: Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.
earthshaker_enchant_totem.Note1: Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.
earthshaker_enchant_totem.Lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
earthshaker_enchant_totem.Description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

lich_dark_ritual.name: Sacrifice
lich_dark_ritual.Lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
lich_dark_ritual.Description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

viper_viper_strike.name: Viper Strike
viper_viper_strike.Note0: Slow works on spell immune units.
viper_viper_strike.Lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
viper_viper_strike.Description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
viper_viper_strike.aghanim_description: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.

tidehunter_kraken_shell.Note2: Kraken Shell removes most buffs, even if they are generally not purgable.
tidehunter_kraken_shell.name: Kraken Shell
tidehunter_kraken_shell.Note0: Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards buff removal.
tidehunter_kraken_shell.Note1: The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for 6 seconds.
tidehunter_kraken_shell.Lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
tidehunter_kraken_shell.Description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

clinkz_wind_walk.name: Skeleton Walk
clinkz_wind_walk.Note0: Will not break most channeling of spells or items upon activation.
clinkz_wind_walk.Lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
clinkz_wind_walk.Description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

batrider_sticky_napalm.name: Sticky Napalm
batrider_sticky_napalm.Note0: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.
batrider_sticky_napalm.Lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
batrider_sticky_napalm.Description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.

spirit_breaker_nether_strike.name: Nether Strike
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.Note0: Spirit Breaker appears behind the target to deliver the bash.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.aghanim_description: Causes the Greater Bash to hit an area around the initial target, decreases cooldown, and increases cast range.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.Lore: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.Description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

invoker_attribute_bonus_Description.name: Improves all attributes per point spent

bane_fiends_grip.name: Fiend's Grip
bane_fiends_grip.Note0: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
bane_fiends_grip.aghanim_description: Increases damage per second, mana drain, and duration. If an enemy tries to attack Bane while he is channeling Fiend's Grip, they will instantly have Bane's current level of Nightmare inflicted upon them.
bane_fiends_grip.Lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
bane_fiends_grip.Description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

storm_spirit_overload.Description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
storm_spirit_overload.name: Overload

viper_poison_attack.name: Poison Attack
viper_poison_attack.Note0: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.
viper_poison_attack.Lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
viper_poison_attack.Description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.name: Illuminate
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.Note0: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.Lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.Description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

luna_lunar_blessing.name: Lunar Blessing
luna_lunar_blessing.Lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
luna_lunar_blessing.Description: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

techies_minefield_sign.aghanim_description: Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.
techies_minefield_sign.name: Minefield Sign
techies_minefield_sign.Description: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts %lifetime% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

shadow_demon_shadow_poison.name: Shadow Poison
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.Note0: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.release_Description: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.Lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.Description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

templar_assassin_psi_blades.name: Psi Blades
templar_assassin_psi_blades.Note1: Attack effects like Unique Attack Modifiers and Bash will only be applied to the main target.
templar_assassin_psi_blades.Lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
templar_assassin_psi_blades.Description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

necrolyte_reapers_scythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.Note0: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.Note1: The stun goes through spell immunity, but not the damage.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.Lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.Description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have %respawn_constant% seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

night_stalker_darkness.name: Darkness
night_stalker_darkness.aghanim_description: Grants unobstructed vision in the night. The improved vision does not depend on using Darkness.
night_stalker_darkness.Lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.
night_stalker_darkness.Description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to %fixed_vision%. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

ember_spirit_flame_guard.name: Flame Guard
ember_spirit_flame_guard.Note0: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
ember_spirit_flame_guard.Lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
ember_spirit_flame_guard.Description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.

abaddon_frostmourne.name: Curse of Avernus
abaddon_frostmourne.Lore: The curse that slows an enemy, speeds an ally.
abaddon_frostmourne.Description: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.

bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.aghanim_description: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range.
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.Lore: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.Description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

witch_doctor_maledict.name: Maledict
witch_doctor_maledict.Note0: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.
witch_doctor_maledict.Lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
witch_doctor_maledict.Description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

nyx_assassin_vendetta.name: Vendetta
nyx_assassin_vendetta.Note1: If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.
nyx_assassin_vendetta.Lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
nyx_assassin_vendetta.Description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

tinker_rearm.Note0: Rearm works on all items except Black King Bar, Arcane Boots, Helm of the Dominator, Hand of Midas, Refresher Orb, Linken's Sphere, Pipe of Insight, and Necronomicon.
tinker_rearm.name: Rearm
tinker_rearm.Lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
tinker_rearm.Description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

weaver_the_swarm.name: The Swarm
weaver_the_swarm.Note0: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires.
weaver_the_swarm.Lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
weaver_the_swarm.Note2: Beetles provide 321/321 sight, but will drop off their target if it becomes invisible.
weaver_the_swarm.Description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
weaver_the_swarm.Note1: Beetles are Spell Immune, but can be killed in 4 attacks from a hero, or 8 from other units.

nevermore_requiem.name: Requiem of Souls
nevermore_requiem.Note0: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every 2 souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter).
nevermore_requiem.Note1: The movement and attack damage reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
nevermore_requiem.Lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
nevermore_requiem.Description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
nevermore_requiem.aghanim_description: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

naga_siren_mirror_image.name: Mirror Image
naga_siren_mirror_image.Note0: Naga Siren is invulnerable for 0.3 seconds when casting, allowing her to dodge stuns and damage.
naga_siren_mirror_image.Note1: Upon casting, most effects are removed from Naga Siren.
naga_siren_mirror_image.Lore: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.
naga_siren_mirror_image.Description: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

juggernaut_blade_fury.Note2: Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
juggernaut_blade_fury.name: Blade Fury
juggernaut_blade_fury.Note0: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units.
juggernaut_blade_fury.Note1: You can use items during Blade Fury.
juggernaut_blade_fury.Lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
juggernaut_blade_fury.Description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

nevermore_shadowraze3.name: Shadowraze
nevermore_shadowraze3.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

spirit_breaker_greater_bash.name: Greater Bash
spirit_breaker_greater_bash.Note0: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
spirit_breaker_greater_bash.Lore: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
spirit_breaker_greater_bash.Description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

tiny_avalanche.name: Avalanche
tiny_avalanche.Note0: Deals damage over a 1 second duration.
tiny_avalanche.Lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
tiny_avalanche.Description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

clinkz_death_pact.Note2: When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.
clinkz_death_pact.name: Death Pact
clinkz_death_pact.Note0: If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.
clinkz_death_pact.Note1: Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.
clinkz_death_pact.Lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
clinkz_death_pact.Description: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.name: Rolling Boulder
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.Note0: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.Lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.Description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a %delay%s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will have their movement speed slowed.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.Note1: The boulder has a radius of 150.

brewmaster_storm_cyclone.name: Cyclone
brewmaster_storm_cyclone.Description: Encloses a unit in a tornado, removing it from the battlefield.

shadow_demon_disruption.name: Disruption
shadow_demon_disruption.Lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
shadow_demon_disruption.Description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.Note0: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.Lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.Description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

luna_eclipse.name: Eclipse
luna_eclipse.Note4: There is a .6 seconds gap between beams, .3 seconds with scepter.
luna_eclipse.Note0: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.
luna_eclipse.Note1: Beams will stop if Luna is killed.
luna_eclipse.Note2: Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun.
luna_eclipse.Lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
luna_eclipse.aghanim_description: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.
luna_eclipse.Description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

zuus_cloud.name: Nimbus
zuus_cloud.Note0: Grants 100 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
zuus_cloud.Description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

shredder_reactive_armor.name: Reactive Armor
shredder_reactive_armor.Lore: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
shredder_reactive_armor.Description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

puck_waning_rift.name: Waning Rift
puck_waning_rift.Lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
puck_waning_rift.Description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

rubick_empty2.name: Stolen Spell
rubick_empty2.Description: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.

bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.name: Shuriken Toss
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.aghanim_description: Allows Shuriken Toss to bounce twice on each hero.
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.Lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.Description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a %bounce_aoe% radius of each other.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

doom_bringer_scorched_earth.name: Scorched Earth
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.Note0: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.Note1: Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.Lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.Description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

bristleback_warpath.name: Warpath
bristleback_warpath.Note0: Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.
bristleback_warpath.Lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
bristleback_warpath.Description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.Note2: Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.name: Doppelganger
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.Note0: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispell debuffs.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.Note1: Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.Lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.Description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After %delay% second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600%% damage and deals 20%% damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

shadow_demon_demonic_purge.name: Demonic Purge
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.Note0: Demonic Purge will slow Spell Immune units.
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.aghanim_description: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 40 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.Lore: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.Description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

rubick_fade_bolt.Lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
rubick_fade_bolt.name: Fade Bolt
rubick_fade_bolt.Description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.

wisp_empty2.name: Spirits Out
wisp_empty2.Description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.

beastmaster_greater_boar_poison.name: Poison
beastmaster_greater_boar_poison.Description: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.

jakiro_macropyre.name: Macropyre
jakiro_macropyre.Note0: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.
jakiro_macropyre.Description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
jakiro_macropyre.Lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
jakiro_macropyre.aghanim_description: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.

doom_bringer_empty1.name: Devoured Ability
doom_bringer_empty1.Description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.

axe_berserkers_call.name: Berserker's Call
axe_berserkers_call.Lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
axe_berserkers_call.Description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

chaos_knight_reality_rift.name: Reality Rift
chaos_knight_reality_rift.Note0: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.
chaos_knight_reality_rift.Lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
chaos_knight_reality_rift.Description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Reduces the target's armor for %armor_duration% seconds.

templar_assassin_trap.name: Trap
templar_assassin_trap.Description: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

earth_spirit_magnetize.name: Magnetize
earth_spirit_magnetize.Lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.
earth_spirit_magnetize.Description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by silence or slows as a result of Geomagnetic Grip or Rolling Boulder, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

tiny_craggy_exterior.name: Craggy Exterior
tiny_craggy_exterior.Note0: The damage and stun occur when an attack lands.
tiny_craggy_exterior.Lore: Melee warriors tend to find attacking the Stone Giant largely ineffective.
tiny_craggy_exterior.Description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers. Melee enemies that attack Tiny have a chance of being stunned.

lich_frost_armor.name: Ice Armor
lich_frost_armor.Note0: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.
lich_frost_armor.Lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
lich_frost_armor.Description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

elder_titan_return_spirit.name: Return Astral Spirit
elder_titan_return_spirit.Description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

brewmaster_storm_wind_walk.name: Wind Walk
brewmaster_storm_wind_walk.Description: Provides temporary invisibility.  Bonus movement speed and attack damage when invisible.

bloodseeker_bloodrage.name: Bloodrage
bloodseeker_bloodrage.Note0: Bloodrage can be cast on enemy and allied units, as well as Bloodseeker himself.
bloodseeker_bloodrage.Note1: Only amplifies for half values when the damage dealer and the receiver are over 2200 range apart.
bloodseeker_bloodrage.Lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
bloodseeker_bloodrage.Description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.

legion_commander_duel.name: Duel
legion_commander_duel.Note0: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
legion_commander_duel.aghanim_description: Increases Duel duration and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take damage from each other.
legion_commander_duel.Lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
legion_commander_duel.Description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

morphling_waveform.name: Waveform
morphling_waveform.Lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
morphling_waveform.Description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

weaver_time_lapse.name: Time Lapse
weaver_time_lapse.Note0: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.
weaver_time_lapse.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.
weaver_time_lapse.Lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
weaver_time_lapse.Description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

arc_warden_magnetic_field.Description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
arc_warden_magnetic_field.Lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
arc_warden_magnetic_field.name: Magnetic Field

necrolyte_sadist.name: Ghost Shroud
necrolyte_sadist.Lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
necrolyte_sadist.Description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

bounty_hunter_track.name: Track
bounty_hunter_track.Note0: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died.
bounty_hunter_track.Lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
bounty_hunter_track.Note2: The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold.
bounty_hunter_track.Description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.
bounty_hunter_track.Note1: Track's effect is only visible to allies.

kunkka_return.name: Return
kunkka_return.Description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

item_medallion_of_courage_Lore.name: The bearer has no fear of combat.

death_prophet_carrion_swarm.Note0: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.name: Crypt Swarm
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.Lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.Description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

invoker_alacrity.name: Alacrity
invoker_alacrity.Description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

antimage_mana_break.name: Mana Break
antimage_mana_break.Note0: Mana Burn is blocked by spell immunity.
antimage_mana_break.Note1: You can lifeleech the damage dealt by this skill with a Lifesteal aura.
antimage_mana_break.Lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
antimage_mana_break.Description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60%% of the mana burned as damage to the target.\n\nMana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

chen_test_of_faith.name: Test of Faith
chen_test_of_faith.teleport_Description: Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.
chen_test_of_faith.Lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
chen_test_of_faith.Description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

alchemist_acid_spray.name: Acid Spray
alchemist_acid_spray.Lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
alchemist_acid_spray.Description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.name: Arctic Burn
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.Note0: Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.aghanim_description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining 40 mana per second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.Lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.Note2: Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to 0.1.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.Description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of %percent_damage%%% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her %night_vision_bonus% additional vision range at night while soaring.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.Note1: This ability does not affect Roshan.

legion_commander_press_the_attack.name: Press The Attack
legion_commander_press_the_attack.Lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
legion_commander_press_the_attack.Description: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

vengefulspirit_nether_swap.Note2: Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.name: Nether Swap
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown, allows swapping of non-hero units and causes Vengeful Spirit to spawn a Vengeance Illusion when she dies. Vengeance illusion lasts until she revives and is able to use all of your abilities (but not items).
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.Note1: Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.Lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.Description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.name: Splinter Blast
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.Note0: The primary projectile moves at 500 movespeed, or reaches the target in 1 second, whichever is faster up to 4000 speed.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.Note1: Neither the primary or secondary projectiles can be disjointed.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.Lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.Description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a %split_radius% radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by %movespeed_slow_tooltip%%%.

sniper_assassinate.Note2: Interrupts channeling spell, including on Spell Immune units.
sniper_assassinate.name: Assassinate
sniper_assassinate.Note0: Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.
sniper_assassinate.aghanim_description: Turns Assassinate into a ground target AoE ability, that after the channel period launches a critical strike and procs headshot on units in the AoE. Only affects visible heroes.
sniper_assassinate.Lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
sniper_assassinate.Description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after %total_cast_time_tooltip% seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

dazzle_shadow_wave.name: Shadow Wave
dazzle_shadow_wave.Note1: If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they will take multiple instances of damage.
dazzle_shadow_wave.Lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
dazzle_shadow_wave.Description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

arc_warden_spark_wraith.name: Spark Wraith
arc_warden_spark_wraith.Lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
arc_warden_spark_wraith.Description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.name: Spawn Spiderlings
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.Note0: If the target is killed within 2 seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.Note1: Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.Lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
