broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.Description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

ogre_magi_ignite.Note2: Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units with 1400 area of effect.
ogre_magi_ignite.name: Ignite
ogre_magi_ignite.Note0: Multicast makes this spell have an area of effect (150/300/450 based on Multicast level).
ogre_magi_ignite.Note1: Multicast makes this spell have 150 additional cast range for every Multicast level.
ogre_magi_ignite.Description: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

puck_dream_coil.name: Dream Coil
puck_dream_coil.Lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
puck_dream_coil.aghanim_description: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.
puck_dream_coil.Description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for %dstun_duration% seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

faceless_void_time_lock.name: Time Lock
faceless_void_time_lock.Note0: Stun works on Spell Immune units.
faceless_void_time_lock.Note1: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
faceless_void_time_lock.Lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
faceless_void_time_lock.Description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

tusk_frozen_sigil.Note2: Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
tusk_frozen_sigil.name: Frozen Sigil
tusk_frozen_sigil.Note0: If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.
tusk_frozen_sigil.Note1: The Sigil has unobstructed movement, has a 310 movement speed, requires 3/3/4/4 hero attacks to destroy and 12/12/16/16 creep attacks to destroy, provides 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.
tusk_frozen_sigil.Description: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.

special_bonus_unique_lich_2.name: Attacks Apply 30% MS and AS Slow

invoker_sun_strike.name: Sun Strike
invoker_sun_strike.Note0: Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
invoker_sun_strike.Note1: Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.
invoker_sun_strike.Description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

skeleton_king_mortal_strike.Description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.
skeleton_king_mortal_strike.Lore: One blow to crush a foe.
skeleton_king_mortal_strike.name: Mortal Strike

elder_titan_natural_order.name: Natural Order
elder_titan_natural_order.Note0: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
elder_titan_natural_order.spirit_Note0: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
elder_titan_natural_order.Lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
elder_titan_natural_order.spirit_Description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
elder_titan_natural_order.Description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
elder_titan_natural_order.spirit_Lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.

brewmaster_drunken_brawler.name: Drunken Brawler
brewmaster_drunken_brawler.Note0: The guaranteed critical attack and guaranteed dodge chance are on separate timers.
brewmaster_drunken_brawler.Lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
brewmaster_drunken_brawler.Description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

nyx_assassin_unburrow.name: Unburrow
nyx_assassin_unburrow.Lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

spectre_reality.name: Reality
spectre_reality.Lore: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.
spectre_reality.Description: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.

doom_bringer_infernal_blade.name: Infernal Blade
doom_bringer_infernal_blade.Lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
doom_bringer_infernal_blade.Description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals %burn_damage% + %burn_damage_pct%%% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

rubick_empty1.name: Stolen Spell
rubick_empty1.Description: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.

zuus_arc_lightning.name: Arc Lightning
zuus_arc_lightning.Lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
zuus_arc_lightning.Description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

techies_suicide.name: Blast Off!
techies_suicide.Note0: Dying from this ability counts as suicide, and does not award gold or experience to the enemy team.
techies_suicide.Note1: Techies still earn experience for suicide kills made with this ability.
techies_suicide.Description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies damage equal to 50% of their max health.

naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.name: Song of the Siren
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.Note0: Units affected by Song of the Siren are invulnerable and cannot take damage from any source.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.Lore: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.Note2: The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.Description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.cancel_Description: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.aghanim_description: Song of the Siren regenerates all nearby allies for 10% of their health per second.

chaos_knight_phantasm.name: Phantasm
chaos_knight_phantasm.Note0: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.
chaos_knight_phantasm.Note1: Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.
chaos_knight_phantasm.Lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
chaos_knight_phantasm.Description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50%% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal full damage, but take double damage.

Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
chaos_knight_phantasm.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds and allows Phantoms to be cast on an allied hero. 1200 Cast Range

nyx_assassin_mana_burn.name: Mana Burn
nyx_assassin_mana_burn.Lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
nyx_assassin_mana_burn.Description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

broodmother_spin_web.name: Spin Web
broodmother_spin_web.Note0: Has a fade time of 2 seconds.
broodmother_spin_web.Lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
broodmother_spin_web.Note2: If free movement is disabled, you will destroy nearby trees.
broodmother_spin_web.Description: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every %dcharge_restore_time% seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for %damage_time% seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

night_stalker_crippling_fear.Lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.
night_stalker_crippling_fear.name: Crippling Fear
night_stalker_crippling_fear.Description: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.

monkey_king_jingu_mastery.name: Jingu Mastery
monkey_king_jingu_mastery.Note0: Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
monkey_king_jingu_mastery.Lore: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
monkey_king_jingu_mastery.Description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.

omniknight_guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
omniknight_guardian_angel.aghanim_description: Increases duration, radius becomes global and affects buildings.
omniknight_guardian_angel.Lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
omniknight_guardian_angel.Description: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

meepo_geostrike.name: Geostrike
meepo_geostrike.Lore: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.
meepo_geostrike.Description: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.

earth_spirit_stone_caller.name: Stone Remnant
earth_spirit_stone_caller.Lore: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.
earth_spirit_stone_caller.Description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.

bloodseeker_rupture.Description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
bloodseeker_rupture.name: Rupture
bloodseeker_rupture.aghanim_description: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.
bloodseeker_rupture.Lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

rubick_telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
rubick_telekinesis.land_Description: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.
rubick_telekinesis.Note0: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction.
rubick_telekinesis.Lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
rubick_telekinesis.Note2: The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.
rubick_telekinesis.Note1: When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun.
rubick_telekinesis.Description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

dark_seer_ion_shell.Note2: If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.
dark_seer_ion_shell.name: Ion Shell
dark_seer_ion_shell.Note0: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals.
dark_seer_ion_shell.Note1: Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.
dark_seer_ion_shell.Lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
dark_seer_ion_shell.Description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

life_stealer_control.name: Control
life_stealer_control.Description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.

warlock_golem_flaming_fists.name: Flaming Fists
warlock_golem_flaming_fists.Description: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.

undying_soul_rip.name: Soul Rip
undying_soul_rip.Note0: Can heal Tombstone, but can't heal or damage other buildings.
undying_soul_rip.Note1: Does not rip from invisible units.
undying_soul_rip.Lore: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.
undying_soul_rip.Description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

bane_brain_sap.name: Brain Sap
bane_brain_sap.Lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
bane_brain_sap.Description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

tinker_heat_seeking_missile.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
tinker_heat_seeking_missile.Lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
tinker_heat_seeking_missile.Description: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

slark_dark_pact.Note3: The pulses stop if Slark dies.
slark_dark_pact.Note2: You can't kill yourself with this skill.
slark_dark_pact.name: Dark Pact
slark_dark_pact.Note0: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage.
slark_dark_pact.Note1: Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark.
slark_dark_pact.Lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
slark_dark_pact.Description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50%% of the damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

morphling_replicate.name: Replicate
morphling_replicate.Note0: You can't target yourself with Replicate.
morphling_replicate.Lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
morphling_replicate.Description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing %tooltip_illusion_damage_out_pct%%% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100%% of any incoming damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.

treant_eyes_in_the_forest.name: Eyes In The Forest
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.Note0: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.Note1: If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.Lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.Description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.

leshrac_split_earth.name: Split Earth
leshrac_split_earth.Note0: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
leshrac_split_earth.Note1: There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.
leshrac_split_earth.Lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
leshrac_split_earth.Description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

dragon_knight_dragon_blood.name: Dragon Blood
dragon_knight_dragon_blood.Lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
dragon_knight_dragon_blood.Description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

slardar_bash.name: Bash of the Deep
slardar_bash.Note0: Stun works on Spell Immune units.
slardar_bash.Note1: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
slardar_bash.Lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
slardar_bash.Description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.

lion_voodoo.name: Hex
lion_voodoo.Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
lion_voodoo.Lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
lion_voodoo.Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

morphling_hybrid.name: Hybrid
morphling_hybrid.Description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

jakiro_dual_breath.name: Dual Breath
jakiro_dual_breath.Note0: Can hit units up to 1000 range away.
jakiro_dual_breath.Note1: Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.
jakiro_dual_breath.Lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
jakiro_dual_breath.Description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

wisp_empty1.name: Spirits In
wisp_empty1.Description: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.

lycan_shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
lycan_shapeshift.Note0: Hex doesn't remove Lycan's movement speed.
lycan_shapeshift.Note1: Lycan has a smaller collision size in this state.
lycan_shapeshift.Lore: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
lycan_shapeshift.Description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.

invoker_forge_spirit.name: Forge Spirit
invoker_forge_spirit.Note0: Casting this abiliy will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.
invoker_forge_spirit.Description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, mana, and armor are based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.

queenofpain_scream_of_pain.name: Scream Of Pain
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.Note0: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.Note1: Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.Lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.Description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

slark_pounce.Note3: Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.
slark_pounce.Note2: Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location.
slark_pounce.name: Pounce
slark_pounce.Note0: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance.
slark_pounce.Note1: Spell Immune units cannot be leashed.
slark_pounce.Lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
slark_pounce.Description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

clinkz_searing_arrows.name: Searing Arrows
clinkz_searing_arrows.Note0: Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.
clinkz_searing_arrows.Note1: The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.
clinkz_searing_arrows.Lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
clinkz_searing_arrows.Description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

invoker_ice_wall.name: Ice Wall
invoker_ice_wall.Note0: The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.
invoker_ice_wall.Description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

winter_wyvern_cold_embrace.name: Cold Embrace
winter_wyvern_cold_embrace.Lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
winter_wyvern_cold_embrace.Description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

abaddon_aphotic_shield.name: Aphotic Shield
abaddon_aphotic_shield.Lore: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
abaddon_aphotic_shield.Description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.name: Stifling Dagger
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.Note0: If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.Lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.Description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing %base_damage%+%attack_factor_tooltip%%% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

doom_bringer_empty2.name: Devoured Ability
doom_bringer_empty2.Description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.

necrolyte_death_pulse.name: Death Pulse
necrolyte_death_pulse.Lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
necrolyte_death_pulse.Description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

meepo_poof.name: Poof
meepo_poof.Note0: Can be cast through the minimap.
meepo_poof.Lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
meepo_poof.Description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.

dazzle_weave.name: Weave
dazzle_weave.Note0: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.
dazzle_weave.aghanim_description: Increases radius and armor per second.
dazzle_weave.Lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
dazzle_weave.Description: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

nevermore_dark_lord.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
nevermore_dark_lord.Note0: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
nevermore_dark_lord.Lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
nevermore_dark_lord.Description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

slardar_amplify_damage.name: Corrosive Haze
slardar_amplify_damage.Note0: Gives True Sight and vision of the target.
slardar_amplify_damage.Lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.
slardar_amplify_damage.Description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

tusk_launch_snowball.Note3: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
tusk_launch_snowball.Note2: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
tusk_launch_snowball.name: Launch Snowball
tusk_launch_snowball.Note1: The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.
tusk_launch_snowball.Description: Launch the snowball toward the target.

crystal_maiden_freezing_field.name: Freezing Field
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.Note0: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second).
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.aghanim_description: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 2.5 seconds.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.Note1: Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 100 explosions.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.Lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.Description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

dragon_knight_dragon_tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon_knight_dragon_tail.Lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
dragon_knight_dragon_tail.Description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

death_prophet_spirit_siphon.name: Spirit Siphon
death_prophet_spirit_siphon.Note0: Cannot cast multiple on same target.
death_prophet_spirit_siphon.Description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining %damage% + %damage_pct%%% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by %movement_slow%%%.

chen_penitence.Description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.
chen_penitence.Lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
chen_penitence.name: Penitence

troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged.Lore: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged.Description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

phoenix_fire_spirits.name: Fire Spirits
phoenix_fire_spirits.Note0: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.
phoenix_fire_spirits.Lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
phoenix_fire_spirits.Description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

venomancer_venomous_gale.Note2: Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.
venomancer_venomous_gale.name: Venomous Gale
venomancer_venomous_gale.Note0: Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
venomancer_venomous_gale.Note1: Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
venomancer_venomous_gale.Lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
venomancer_venomous_gale.Description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

medusa_mystic_snake.name: Mystic Snake
medusa_mystic_snake.Lore: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.
medusa_mystic_snake.Description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals %snake_mana_steal%%% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.

bounty_hunter_wind_walk.name: Shadow Walk
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.Note0: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.Note1: The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.Lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.Description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

ursa_overpower.name: Overpower
ursa_overpower.Note0: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.
ursa_overpower.Lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
ursa_overpower.Description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

furion_sprout.name: Sprout
furion_sprout.Note0: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
furion_sprout.Note1: Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
furion_sprout.Lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
furion_sprout.Description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

magnataur_skewer.Lore: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
magnataur_skewer.name: Skewer
magnataur_skewer.Description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.name: Geomagnetic Grip
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.Note0: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.aghanim_description: Allows Geomagnetic Grip to pull allied heroes.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.Note1: Can pull allied heroes with Scepter.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.Lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.Description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced, and take damage if the gripped target is a Stone Remnant.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.name: Gust
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.Lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.Description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

earthshaker_fissure.name: Fissure
earthshaker_fissure.Note0: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
earthshaker_fissure.Note1: Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
earthshaker_fissure.Lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
earthshaker_fissure.Description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

keeper_of_the_light_recall.Note3: Can be cast through the minimap, choosing the nearest friendly hero.
keeper_of_the_light_recall.Note2: You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.
keeper_of_the_light_recall.name: Recall
keeper_of_the_light_recall.Note0: If Keeper of the Light dies, the spell effect is interrupted.
keeper_of_the_light_recall.Description: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

treant_leech_seed.name: Leech Seed
treant_leech_seed.Lore: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.
treant_leech_seed.Description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 6 times.

furion_force_of_nature.name: Nature's Call
furion_force_of_nature.Note0: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.
furion_force_of_nature.Lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
furion_force_of_nature.Description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have %treant_health_tooltip% health and deal %treant_min_dmg_tooltip%-%treant_max_dmg_tooltip% damage.

treant_overgrowth.name: Overgrowth
treant_overgrowth.Note0: Works on Spell Immune units, but if units gain spell immunity after the effect starts, they'll break free.
treant_overgrowth.aghanim_description: When Overgrowth is cast, it is also cast around Eye of the Forest to deal 175 damage per second.
treant_overgrowth.Note1: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.
treant_overgrowth.Lore: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.
treant_overgrowth.Description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

nevermore_shadowraze1.name: Shadowraze
nevermore_shadowraze1.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

razor_plasma_field.name: Plasma Field
razor_plasma_field.Lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.
razor_plasma_field.Description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

lone_druid_true_form.druid_aghanim_description: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
lone_druid_true_form.battle_cry_Lore: When Sylla cries in the forest, the reverberations are felt for a great distance.
lone_druid_true_form.name: True Form
lone_druid_true_form.Note0: You can dodge stuns during the 2 second duration of transforming.
lone_druid_true_form.Lore: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
lone_druid_true_form.druid_Description: Return to Druid form.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lone_druid_true_form.Description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lone_druid_true_form.Note1: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Lone Druid was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
lone_druid_true_form.battle_cry_Description: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.

legion_commander_overwhelming_odds.name: Overwhelming Odds
legion_commander_overwhelming_odds.Lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
legion_commander_overwhelming_odds.Description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.

visage_summon_familiars.name: Summon Familiars
visage_summon_familiars.Note0: Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.
visage_summon_familiars.Note1: Each Familiar starts with 7 damage charges.
visage_summon_familiars.Lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
visage_summon_familiars.stone_form_Description: After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After %dstone_duration% seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
visage_summon_familiars.Description: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

monkey_king_mischief.name: Mischief
monkey_king_mischief.Description: Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise.

ursa_fury_swipes.name: Fury Swipes
ursa_fury_swipes.Lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
ursa_fury_swipes.Description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

terrorblade_sunder.name: Sunder
terrorblade_sunder.Lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
terrorblade_sunder.Description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

chaos_knight_chaos_strike.name: Chaos Strike
chaos_knight_chaos_strike.Lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
chaos_knight_chaos_strike.Description: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for %lifesteal%%% of the damage .

warlock_fatal_bonds.name: Fatal Bonds
warlock_fatal_bonds.Note0: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.
warlock_fatal_bonds.Lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
warlock_fatal_bonds.Description: Binds several enemy units together, causing %damage_share_percentage%%% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

beastmaster_hawk_invisibility.name: Invisibility
beastmaster_hawk_invisibility.Description: If motionless for some time, the hawk becomes invisible.

skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt.Note0: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt.Lore: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt.Description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

centaur_double_edge.Note0: Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.
centaur_double_edge.name: Double Edge
centaur_double_edge.Lore: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.
centaur_double_edge.Description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

invoker_invoke.name: Invoke
invoker_invoke.Note0: The arrangement of instances does not matter.
invoker_invoke.aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown and removes mana cost from Invoke. Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.
invoker_invoke.Note1: Invoke will not cost mana or go on cooldown if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
invoker_invoke.Lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
invoker_invoke.Description: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use.  Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

rattletrap_rocket_flare.name: Rocket Flare
rattletrap_rocket_flare.Lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
rattletrap_rocket_flare.Description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

rattletrap_battery_assault.name: Battery Assault
rattletrap_battery_assault.Note1: Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.
rattletrap_battery_assault.Lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
rattletrap_battery_assault.Description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

beastmaster_inner_beast.name: Inner Beast
beastmaster_inner_beast.Lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
beastmaster_inner_beast.Description: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

earth_spirit_petrify.name: Enchant Remnant
earth_spirit_petrify.Lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
earth_spirit_petrify.Description: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.

earthshaker_echo_slam.name: Echo Slam
earthshaker_echo_slam.Note0: Will not damage ethereal units, such as those in Ghost Form.
earthshaker_echo_slam.Note1: Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.
earthshaker_echo_slam.Lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
earthshaker_echo_slam.Description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

ursa_enrage.name: Enrage
ursa_enrage.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
ursa_enrage.Lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
ursa_enrage.Description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take %damage_reduction%%% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

axe_culling_blade.name: Culling Blade
axe_culling_blade.Lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
axe_culling_blade.Description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
axe_culling_blade.aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown, increases kill threshold, and increases bonus movement speed duration.

lion_mana_drain.Lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
lion_mana_drain.name: Mana Drain
lion_mana_drain.Description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

oracle_fortunes_end.name: Fortune's End
oracle_fortunes_end.Lore: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.
oracle_fortunes_end.Description: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, stops movement, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to %max_channel_time_tooltip% seconds. The stop duration is equal to the time spent channeling.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

furion_wrath_of_nature.name: Wrath of Nature
furion_wrath_of_nature.Note0: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
furion_wrath_of_nature.aghanim_description: Increases damage. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within 4 seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has 3 times as much health and damage.
furion_wrath_of_nature.Note1: Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
furion_wrath_of_nature.Lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
furion_wrath_of_nature.Description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

winter_wyvern_winters_curse.name: Winter's Curse
winter_wyvern_winters_curse.Note0: If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse.Note1: Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse.Lore: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse.Description: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies.

monkey_king_boundless_strike.name: Boundless Strike
monkey_king_boundless_strike.Lore: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
monkey_king_boundless_strike.Description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.

storm_spirit_ball_lightning.Note2: Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.
storm_spirit_ball_lightning.name: Ball Lightning
storm_spirit_ball_lightning.Note0: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling.
storm_spirit_ball_lightning.Description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

riki_blink_strike.Note2: You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.
riki_blink_strike.name: Blink Strike
riki_blink_strike.Note0: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
riki_blink_strike.Note1: Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
riki_blink_strike.Lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
riki_blink_strike.Description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

sven_storm_bolt.name: Storm Hammer
sven_storm_bolt.Lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
sven_storm_bolt.Description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.name: Arcane Aura
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.Note0: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.Note1: The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.Lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.Description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

chen_hand_of_god.name: Hand of God
chen_hand_of_god.Lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
chen_hand_of_god.Description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

oracle_purifying_flames.name: Purifying Flames
oracle_purifying_flames.Note0: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
oracle_purifying_flames.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown and improves cast point.
oracle_purifying_flames.Lore: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
oracle_purifying_flames.Description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

windrunner_powershot.Note0: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
windrunner_powershot.name: Powershot
windrunner_powershot.Lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
windrunner_powershot.Description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%%.

shredder_timber_chain.name: Timber Chain
shredder_timber_chain.Lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
shredder_timber_chain.Description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

ursa_earthshock.name: Earthshock
ursa_earthshock.Lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
ursa_earthshock.Description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

axe_counter_helix.name: Counter Helix
axe_counter_helix.Note0: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
axe_counter_helix.Lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
axe_counter_helix.Description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

shadow_shaman_ether_shock.name: Ether Shock
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.Note0: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.Lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.Description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

death_prophet_silence.name: Silence
death_prophet_silence.Lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
death_prophet_silence.Description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abyssal_underlord_firestorm.name: Firestorm
abyssal_underlord_firestorm.Lore: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
abyssal_underlord_firestorm.Description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

alchemist_unstable_concoction.name: Unstable Concoction
alchemist_unstable_concoction.Note4: Once thrown, Unstable Concoction stops brewing.
alchemist_unstable_concoction.Note0: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing.
alchemist_unstable_concoction.Lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
alchemist_unstable_concoction.Note2: You can deny yourself with this skill.
alchemist_unstable_concoction.Note1: A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. This timer is visible to enemies.
alchemist_unstable_concoction.throw_Description: Throw it before it blows up!
alchemist_unstable_concoction.Description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

lone_druid_spirit_bear.name: Summon Spirit Bear
lone_druid_spirit_bear.entangle_Note0: Entangled units can't use Blink abilities, and are revealed if they are invisible.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.Note0: Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.demolish_Description: Increases the power of the Spirit Bear, causing it to deal more damage to buildings and have additional spell resistance.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.Lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.Description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers %backlash_damage%%% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.entangle_Description: Attacks have a chance to cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the attacked enemy unit, and dealing damage per second.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.Note1: You can't resummon the bear if it has taken damage in the past 3 seconds.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.aghanim_description: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.Note2: Using Hand of Midas from Spirit Bear grants the earned XP to Lone Druid.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.return_Description: Immediately teleports the Spirit Bear back to the Lone Druid.  The Spirit Bear cannot teleport if it has taken damage from a player unit in the last 3 seconds.

item_monkey_king_bar_Lore.name: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

vengefulspirit_command_aura.name: Vengeance Aura
vengefulspirit_command_aura.Note0: The bonus damage provided by the aura is based on base damage and primary attribute.
vengefulspirit_command_aura.Lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
vengefulspirit_command_aura.Description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.

earth_spirit_boulder_smash.name: Boulder Smash
earth_spirit_boulder_smash.Note0: Stun is only applied if the initial target is a Stone Remnant.
earth_spirit_boulder_smash.Note1: Boulder Smash's cooldown is not reset if it fails to knock back a unit or Remnant.
earth_spirit_boulder_smash.Lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.
earth_spirit_boulder_smash.Description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also stunned. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.

windrunner_shackleshot.name: Shackleshot
windrunner_shackleshot.Note0: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
windrunner_shackleshot.Note1: Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 525/500 behind it.
windrunner_shackleshot.Lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
windrunner_shackleshot.Description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

centaur_stampede.name: Stampede
centaur_stampede.aghanim_description: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.
centaur_stampede.Lore: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.
centaur_stampede.Description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura.name: Essence Aura
obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura.Note0: Other than Arcane Orb, most skills without cooldowns cannot trigger Essence Aura.
obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura.Lore: The crystals of the Outworld produce arcane power, and the Harbinger channels it into the world of mortals.
obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura.Description: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

special_bonus_unique_warlock_1.name: Magic Immunity for Chaotic Offering Golems

zuus_lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
zuus_lightning_bolt.Note0: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.
zuus_lightning_bolt.Lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
zuus_lightning_bolt.Description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in %spread_aoe% range.

invoker_tornado.name: Tornado
invoker_tornado.Note0: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.
invoker_tornado.Description: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild.name: Call of the Wild: Hawk
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild.boar_Description: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild.boar_Lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild.Lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild.Description: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.

razor_eye_of_the_storm.name: Eye of the Storm
razor_eye_of_the_storm.Note0: Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
razor_eye_of_the_storm.aghanim_description: Causes faster strikes that can damage structures as well.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
razor_eye_of_the_storm.Description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

warlock_upheaval.name: Upheaval
warlock_upheaval.Note0: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.
warlock_upheaval.Lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
warlock_upheaval.Description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

bloodseeker_blood_bath.name: Blood Rite
bloodseeker_blood_bath.Note0: Total time is a 2.6 second delay plus a 0.4 second cast time.
bloodseeker_blood_bath.Lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
bloodseeker_blood_bath.Description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

jakiro_ice_path.name: Ice Path
jakiro_ice_path.Note0: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.
jakiro_ice_path.Lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
jakiro_ice_path.Description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant.name: Activate Fire Remnant
ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant.Lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!
ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant.Description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.

skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.name: Mystic Flare
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.Note0: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.aghanim_description: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts an ability, a different random nearby target will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.Note1: Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.Lore: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.Description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over %duration% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

magnataur_reverse_polarity.name: Reverse Polarity
magnataur_reverse_polarity.Note0: Disable and pull work through spell immunity.
magnataur_reverse_polarity.Lore: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
magnataur_reverse_polarity.Description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

slardar_sprint.name: Guardian Sprint
slardar_sprint.Note0: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.
slardar_sprint.Lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
slardar_sprint.Description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.

lich_chain_frost.name: Chain Frost
lich_chain_frost.Note0: The first target will be immediately interrupted.  This stun goes through spell immunity.
lich_chain_frost.Note3: Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.
lich_chain_frost.Description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to %jumps% times, slowing and damaging each time it hits.  The first target is mini-stunned.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lich_chain_frost.Note2: Chain Frost has a movement speed of 850.
lich_chain_frost.Lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
lich_chain_frost.aghanim_description: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.

tusk_ice_shards.Description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for %shard_duration% seconds.
tusk_ice_shards.name: Ice Shards
tusk_ice_shards.Lore: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.

oracle_false_promise.name: False Promise
oracle_false_promise.Note0: Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
oracle_false_promise.Note1: The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
oracle_false_promise.Lore: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
oracle_false_promise.Description: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

pugna_nether_blast.name: Nether Blast
pugna_nether_blast.Lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
pugna_nether_blast.Description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.name: Vampiric Aura
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.Note0: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.Note1: Can be toggled to make heroes only.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.Lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.Description: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

item_ogre_axe_Lore.name: You grow stronger just by holding it.

puck_phase_shift.Note2: Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
puck_phase_shift.name: Phase Shift
puck_phase_shift.Note0: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
puck_phase_shift.Note1: Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
puck_phase_shift.Lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
puck_phase_shift.Description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.Note3: Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.Note2: Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.name: Sleight of Fist
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.Note0: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.Note1: A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.Lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.Description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.

mirana_leap.name: Leap
mirana_leap.Lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
mirana_leap.Description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.

wisp_tether.name: Tether
wisp_tether.break_Description: Break the link to the tethered unit.
wisp_tether.Note0: If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).
wisp_tether.Lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
wisp_tether.Note1: The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.
wisp_tether.Description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.

abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice.name: Pit of Malice
abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice.Lore: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice.Description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted for %ensnare_duration% seconds. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every %pit_interval% seconds.

tidehunter_anchor_smash.name: Anchor Smash
tidehunter_anchor_smash.Note0: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.
tidehunter_anchor_smash.Lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
tidehunter_anchor_smash.Description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

juggernaut_blade_dance.name: Blade Dance
juggernaut_blade_dance.Lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
juggernaut_blade_dance.Description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

furion_teleportation.Note2: When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.
furion_teleportation.name: Teleportation
furion_teleportation.Note1: Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
furion_teleportation.Lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
furion_teleportation.Description: Teleports to any point on the map.

monkey_king_primal_spring.name: Primal Spring
monkey_king_primal_spring.Lore: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.
monkey_king_primal_spring.Description: Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.

leshrac_diabolic_edict.Note2: Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.
leshrac_diabolic_edict.name: Diabolic Edict
leshrac_diabolic_edict.Note0: Damage is not reduced by damage block.
leshrac_diabolic_edict.Note1: The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
leshrac_diabolic_edict.Lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
leshrac_diabolic_edict.Description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals %tower_bonus%%% more damage to towers.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.

beastmaster_primal_roar.name: Primal Roar
beastmaster_primal_roar.Note0: The stun will hit Spell Immune units. The damage will not.
beastmaster_primal_roar.Lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
beastmaster_primal_roar.Description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
beastmaster_primal_roar.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown, and increases cast range.

sniper_shrapnel.Note2: Provides vision in the targeted area.
sniper_shrapnel.name: Shrapnel
sniper_shrapnel.Note0: Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.
sniper_shrapnel.Lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
sniper_shrapnel.Description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %charge_restore_time% seconds.

juggernaut_omni_slash.name: Omnislash
juggernaut_omni_slash.Note0: You can use items during Omnislash.
juggernaut_omni_slash.Lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
juggernaut_omni_slash.Note3: Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash.
juggernaut_omni_slash.Note2: Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds.
juggernaut_omni_slash.Description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
juggernaut_omni_slash.aghanim_description: Increases number of slashes and decreases cooldown.

invoker_exort.Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
invoker_exort.name: Exort
invoker_exort.Description: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.

tidehunter_ravage.name: Ravage
tidehunter_ravage.Note1: Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of 775.
tidehunter_ravage.Lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
tidehunter_ravage.Description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

drow_ranger_marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
drow_ranger_marksmanship.aghanim_description: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
drow_ranger_marksmanship.Lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
drow_ranger_marksmanship.Description: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

venomancer_plague_ward.name: Plague Ward
venomancer_plague_ward.Lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
venomancer_plague_ward.Description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50%% of the full damage.

antimage_mana_void.name: Mana Void
antimage_mana_void.Note0: The stun passes through spell immunity.
antimage_mana_void.Note1: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
antimage_mana_void.Lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
antimage_mana_void.Description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

phantom_assassin_blur.name: Blur
phantom_assassin_blur.Lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
phantom_assassin_blur.Description: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

rattletrap_power_cogs.name: Power Cogs
rattletrap_power_cogs.Lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
rattletrap_power_cogs.Description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

spectre_spectral_dagger.name: Spectral Dagger
spectre_spectral_dagger.Note0: There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.
spectre_spectral_dagger.Lore: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
spectre_spectral_dagger.Description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

shadow_shaman_shackles.name: Shackles
shadow_shaman_shackles.Lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
shadow_shaman_shackles.Description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

templar_assassin_psionic_trap.Note2: Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.name: Psionic Trap
