templar_assassin_psionic_trap.Note1: They have invisibility that fades in over 2 seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.Lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.Description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30%% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5%% every second, up to 50%%.

monkey_king_wukongs_command.name: Wukong's Command
monkey_king_wukongs_command.Note0: Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
monkey_king_wukongs_command.Lore: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
monkey_king_wukongs_command.Description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King and all his soldiers receive bonus damage for the spell's duration.

nevermore_necromastery.name: Necromastery
nevermore_necromastery.Note0: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
nevermore_necromastery.Lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
nevermore_necromastery.Description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

dazzle_shallow_grave.name: Shallow Grave
dazzle_shallow_grave.Note0: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.
dazzle_shallow_grave.Lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
dazzle_shallow_grave.Description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

tiny_toss.Note2: Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
tiny_toss.name: Toss
tiny_toss.Note0: If a unit is hit by Avalanche then Tossed, it can be hit a second time by Avalanche if it lands in the area of effect before Avalanche ends.
tiny_toss.Note1: You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
tiny_toss.Lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
tiny_toss.Description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20%% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.

dragon_knight_breathe_fire.name: Breathe Fire
dragon_knight_breathe_fire.Lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
dragon_knight_breathe_fire.Description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

rattletrap_hookshot.name: Hookshot
rattletrap_hookshot.Note0: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.
rattletrap_hookshot.Note1: Hookshot's pull and stun pierce magic immunity. The damage does not.
rattletrap_hookshot.Lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
rattletrap_hookshot.Description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

riki_permanent_invisibility.Note2: Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
riki_permanent_invisibility.name: Cloak and Dagger
riki_permanent_invisibility.Note0: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
riki_permanent_invisibility.Note1: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
riki_permanent_invisibility.Description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

tusk_walrus_punch.name: Walrus PUNCH!
tusk_walrus_punch.Note0: Works fully on Spell Immune units.
tusk_walrus_punch.Lore: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
tusk_walrus_punch.Description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.

phoenix_sun_ray.toggle_move_Description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.
phoenix_sun_ray.name: Sun Ray
phoenix_sun_ray.Lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
phoenix_sun_ray.Description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
phoenix_sun_ray.Note0: Sun Ray has a width of 130 units, and a length of 1300 units.

omniknight_repel.Note0: Repel acts the same as other sources of spell immunity, and cannot be purged.
omniknight_repel.name: Repel
omniknight_repel.Lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
omniknight_repel.Description: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100%% resistance to Magic Damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

batrider_flaming_lasso.Note3: Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.
batrider_flaming_lasso.Note2: Disable works on Spell Immune units.
batrider_flaming_lasso.name: Flaming Lasso
batrider_flaming_lasso.Note0: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.
batrider_flaming_lasso.aghanim_description: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 400 range. The secondary target is tethered to the first. Also causes Flaming Lasso to deal 100 damage per second.
batrider_flaming_lasso.Note1: If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.
batrider_flaming_lasso.Lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
batrider_flaming_lasso.Description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

invoker_wex.name: Wex
invoker_wex.Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
invoker_wex.Description: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

spectre_desolate.name: Desolate
spectre_desolate.Note0: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.
spectre_desolate.Lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
spectre_desolate.Description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone.

medusa_mana_shield.Note0: Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.
medusa_mana_shield.name: Mana Shield
medusa_mana_shield.Lore: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
medusa_mana_shield.Description: Creates a shield that absorbs %absorption_tooltip%%% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.

crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.name: Crystal Nova
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.Lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.Description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.name: Voodoo Restoration
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.Note0: Healing is done in 0.33 second intervals.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.Lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.Description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

alchemist_goblins_greed.Description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next %duration% seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield %bounty_multiplier_tooltip% times their normal gold.
alchemist_goblins_greed.Lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
alchemist_goblins_greed.name: Greevil's Greed

monkey_king_untransform.name: Revert Form
monkey_king_untransform.Description: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.

life_stealer_rage.Description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
life_stealer_rage.Note0: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.
life_stealer_rage.Lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
life_stealer_rage.name: Rage

visage_soul_assumption.name: Soul Assumption
visage_soul_assumption.Note0: Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2 and less than 3000 that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.
visage_soul_assumption.Lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
visage_soul_assumption.Description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than %damage_limit% damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

centaur_khan_war_stomp.name: War Stomp
centaur_khan_war_stomp.Description: The Centaur Conqueror's powerful hooves stomp the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Heroes recover more quickly.

doom_bringer_doom.name: Doom
doom_bringer_doom.Note0: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
doom_bringer_doom.aghanim_description: Increases Doom's duration, and will suspend its duration while the affected unit is within 900 range. Also causes it to remove positive buffs from the target when cast, and break most passive abilities while active.
doom_bringer_doom.Lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
doom_bringer_doom.Description:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

techies_land_mines.Note5: Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
techies_land_mines.name: Proximity Mines
techies_land_mines.Note4: Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.
techies_land_mines.Note0: Cannot be placed within active AoE of another Proximity Mine.
techies_land_mines.Note3: Mines are triggered by invisible units.
techies_land_mines.Note2: Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
techies_land_mines.Description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active %radius% AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for %proximity_threshold% seconds. The explosion deals full damage in the blast radius, and deals %building_damage_pct%%% damage to buildings.
techies_land_mines.Note1: Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.

morphling_morph_replicate.name: Morph Replicate
morphling_morph_replicate.Description: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

wisp_relocate.Note2: If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.
wisp_relocate.name: Relocate
wisp_relocate.Note0: Enemies receive a visual indicator in the world and on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.
wisp_relocate.Note1: If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.
wisp_relocate.Lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
wisp_relocate.Description: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

lone_druid_savage_roar.name: Savage Roar
lone_druid_savage_roar.bear_Description: Spirit Bear roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
lone_druid_savage_roar.bear_Note0: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
lone_druid_savage_roar.Lore: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
lone_druid_savage_roar.Note0: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
lone_druid_savage_roar.bear_Note1: Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.
lone_druid_savage_roar.Description: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
lone_druid_savage_roar.Note1: Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.

ogre_magi_bloodlust.Note2: Can be cast on Spell Immune allies.
ogre_magi_bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
ogre_magi_bloodlust.Note0: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 575 area of effect to receive Bloodlust.
ogre_magi_bloodlust.Lore: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
ogre_magi_bloodlust.Description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.

necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.name: Heartstopper Aura
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.Note0: Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.Lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.Description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

batrider_flamebreak.name: Flamebreak
batrider_flamebreak.Lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
batrider_flamebreak.Description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

brewmaster_earth_hurl_boulder.name: Hurl Boulder
brewmaster_earth_hurl_boulder.Description: Throws a boulder at a unit, doing damage and stunning it.

viper_corrosive_skin.name: Corrosive Skin
viper_corrosive_skin.Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.
viper_corrosive_skin.Lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
viper_corrosive_skin.Description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a %max_range_tooltip% radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

silencer_global_silence.name: Global Silence
silencer_global_silence.Note0: This skill works on invisible and Spell Immune units, but gaining spell immunity will remove its effect.
silencer_global_silence.aghanim_description: Applies the current level of Arcane Curse to all enemy Heroes.
silencer_global_silence.Lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
silencer_global_silence.Description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
